# Getting Started

## Install R Packages

```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse','sf','tmap','lubridate','clock','sftime','rmarkdown')

for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}

```

# Composite map with tmap

# Movement Data

## Import the big data and save the subset data to rds format 

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
logs <- read_sf("/Users/junqiuni/Downloads/visual/pilipalabong/ISSS608/in_class_ex/data/wkt/ParticipantStatusLogs1.csv", 
                options = "GEOM_POSSIBLE_NAMES=currentLocation")
```

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
glimpse(logs)
```

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
logs_selected <- logs %>%
  mutate(Timestamp = date_time_parse(timestamp,
                                      zone="",
                                      format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"))%>%
  mutate(day=get_day(Timestamp)) %>%
  filter(currentMode == 'Transport')
```

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
write_rds(logs_selected,"/Users/junqiuni/Downloads/visual/pilipalabong/ISSS608/in_class_ex/data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```


## Importing the data

```{r echo=TRUE}
logs_selected <- read_rds("/Users/junqiuni/Downloads/visual/pilipalabong/ISSS608/in_class_ex/data/rds/logs_selected.rds")
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings)+
tm_polygons(col = "grey60",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(logs_selected) +
  tm_dots(col = "red")
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
hex <- st_make_grid(buildings, 
                    cellsize=100, 
                    square=FALSE) %>%
  st_sf() %>%
  rowid_to_column('hex_id')
plot(hex)
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                         hex, 
                         join=st_within)
#plot(points_in_hex, pch='.')
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                        hex, 
                        join=st_within) %>%
  st_set_geometry(NULL) %>%
  count(name='pointCount', hex_id)
head(points_in_hex)

```

```{r echo=TRUE}
hex_combined <- hex %>%
  left_join(points_in_hex, 
            by = 'hex_id') %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)
```



```{r echo=TRUE}
tm_shape(hex_combined %>%
           filter(pointCount > 0))+
  tm_fill("pointCount",
          n = 8,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.1)
```

# Movement Path

```{r echo=TRUE}
logs_path <- logs_selected %>%
  group_by(participantId, day) %>%
  summarize(m = mean(Timestamp), 
            do_union=FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
```

```{r echo=TRUE}
print(logs_path)
```




```{r echo=TRUE}
logs_path0=filter(logs_path,participantId == 0)
```



```{r echo=TRUE}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings)+
tm_polygons(col = "grey60",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(logs_path0) +
  tm_lines(col = "blue")
```
